altername_name: James Bond 007: Action Pack: The Living Daylights
name: James Bond 007: Action Pack
overview: The James Bond 007 Action Pack was a 1989 compilation of three James Bond video games published by Amstrad; bundled with the Sinclair ZX Spectrum +2 personal home computer and "Magnum Light Phaser" light gun accessory. The set included the light gun shooter games Lord Bromley's Estate and Q's Armoury, along with a re-branded version of The Living Daylights, titled Mission Zero.
